[ library(ic_gap_sbdd) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

sbdd_indomain(?Var)

Instantiate an integer SBDD variable to an element of its domain
Var
The (integer) SBDD variable to instantiate, or an integer

Description

Like indomain/1, but uses sbdd_try/2 to do the instantiation so that the SBDD dominance checks are performed appropriately.

See Also

fd : indomain / 1, ic : indomain / 1, ic_symbolic : indomain / 1, sbdd_try / 2, sbdd_labeling / 1
